title: Seconds count
creator_credit: Guy Fergusson and Stewart Hardy Films
brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Emergency Resuscitation”

A realistic and dramatic series of incidents likely to be met in service and civilian life, where exhaled air resuscitation may be the quickest or only way of saving life. Emphasises how important it is for the victims, once breathing has restarted, to be taken to hospital for further observations.
